channel.title: I'm in search of a server (I realize this is advertisement)
channel.description: Well I'm really looking for a decent 317 based after 07. Not hard to find for some but for many it is.. I and about 4-5 other friends recently got done playing a server shut down/eco reset without a reason after the owner said no reset would happen. we would like to find another server with decent xp rates (somewhere in the middle) a good eco and fun atmosphere. Please leave out lost-isle as we have all already been there and decided against it. All suggestions are welcome but please don't hate :(

item.title: I'm in search of a server (I realize this is advertisement)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I’m locking this because it’s not really an advertisement, but a request for a server to join. You can look through the threads in this section to find a server that you believe suits your needs. Beyond that, there’s no functionality on this forum for that sort of thing, save for the advertisements page.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm in search of a server (I realize this is advertisement)

item.title: I'm in search of a server (I realize this is advertisement)
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Come check this thread out! It is what you are looking for It is brand new but the staff members are highly dedicated and are working off the clock with continual high quality updates so that players are never bored! Hope to see you online
